description: The famous 1977 “Wow!” signal — a mysterious radio burst detected by Ohio’s Big Ear telescope — has been reanalyzed using modern computing techniques. Researchers digitized old telescope records, finding the signal was about four times stronger than first thought, peaking at 250 Janskys. The recalculations also refined its frequency and sky location, ruling out man-made interference. While the true source remains uncertain, dense hydrogen clouds emitting natural maser signals are now leading candidates. Nearly 50 years later, the Wow! signal continues to puzzle astronomers worldwide.
title: New Analysis of 1977 Wow! Signal Reveals Stronger Cosmic Mystery

description: Alice in Borderland Season 3 will be released on Netflix on September 25. The season features Usagi and Arisu after they survived the dangerous game and are married. However, until one day when Usagi goes missing and Arisu is set to find her, learning about her whereabouts, ready to enter the dangerous place of Borderland, what happens next is worth watching.
title: Alice in Borderland Season 3 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Astronomers have achieved a major breakthrough by capturing the sharpest images of a solar flare ever recorded, using the National Science Foundation’s Daniel K. Inouye Solar Telescope (DKIST). Observed at the hydrogen-alpha wavelength during the decay of an X1.3-class solar flare, the images unveiled hundreds of ultra-fine coronal loops averaging just 48 kilometers wide, with some as narrow as 21 kilometers. Published in The Astrophysical Journal Letters, the findings suggest these slender loops may be the fundamental structures behind magnetic reconnection, the process that drives solar flares. The discovery not only advances understanding of solar physics but also holds promise for better predicting space weather events that can impact satellites, communications, and power systems on Earth.
title: Astronomers Capture Sharpest-Ever Solar Flare Images with NSF’s DKIST Telescope

description: The James Webb Space Telescope observed 3I/ATLAS, the third interstellar object detected in our solar system. Its coma is unusually rich in carbon dioxide with little water or carbon monoxide, suggesting a CO₂-rich core or an insulating crust. Findings raise new questions about its cosmic origin.
title: James Webb Detects Carbon Dioxide–Dominated Coma in Interstellar Object 3I/ATLAS

description: Sumathi Valavu is a Malayalam horror movie that follows a haunted curve in a village where it is believed that after a pregnant woman’s murder during the 1950s, the people have witnessed supernatural events. This movie is said to be based on real-life events. It will soon be released on JioHostar.
title: Sumathi Valavu OTT Release Date Reportedly Revealed Online: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: The Vivo V60 was launched in India earlier this month, and it arrives as yet another camera-centric offering from the brand. At a lower price point, it gets the same triple rear camera system as the Vivo X200 FE, further enhanced by Zeiss optics. However, there is more to a phone than just cameras. So, is the Vivo V60 worth the upgrade? Read on to find out.
title: Vivo V60 Review: Get it for the Cameras

description: The Vivo X300 and X300 Pro are expected to launch in China in October, powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 9500 chipset and featuring Zeiss-backed cameras. A tipster claims that Vivo may also unveil new TWS earphones, while focusing on IoT and flagship wearables next year. The Vivo X300 may include a BeiDou satellite messaging-supported variant with a compact 6.3-inch display. The X300 Pro is tipped to feature a triple-camera setup with a 50-megapixel Sony LYT-828, a 200-megapixel periscope telephoto, and a 50-megapixel ultra-wide sensor.
title: Vivo X300 Pro, Vivo X300 Launch Timeline Leaked; May Get MediaTek Dimensity 9500 SoC

description: Beatoven.ai, a Bengaluru-based artificial intelligence (AI) startup focused on music generation, unveiled its first in-house AI Model on Wednesday. Dubbed Maestro, it is a music model that can generate instrumental tracks across various genres based on text prompts. The company claims that the large language model (LLM) was only trained on fully licensed datasets, and the rightsholders of the music are also eligible for revenue-sharing.
title: Beatoven.ai Unveils Maestro AI Music Generation Model, Announces Revenue-Sharing for Artists

description: Newcastle United has signed a multi-year partnership with global crypto exchange BYDFi, making it the Club’s Official Crypto Exchange Partner. Announced via the Club’s website, the deal aims to expand Newcastle’s international presence while giving fans access to digital finance tools and experiences. Magpies now join Arsenal, Chelsea, Manchester City, and Tottenham Hotspur, who have all partnered with crypto firms as football clubs deepen ties with digital asset platforms.
title: BYDFi Signs Multi-Year Crypto Partnership With Newcastle United

description: Airtel is introducing special measures for its prepaid, postpaid, and broadband users residing in areas currently experiencing extreme weather. The telecom service provider is offering extensions for users whose prepaid plans are expiring and postpaid users whose bill payment date has approached in Jammu, Kashmir, Ladakh, and Himachal Pradesh. Prepaid users will also get free calling and data during this extension period.
title: Airtel Offers Free Data, Calls and Roaming to Customers Impacted by Floods across Jammu, Kashmir, Ladakh, and Himachal Pradesh

description: Anthropic announced a new limited experiment on Tuesday, where it will be providing 1,000 paid subscribers access to Claude’s Google Chrome extension. The extension will sit within the web browser, similar to other extensions, and allow users to ask questions about web pages. While it cannot handle agentic tasks at present, it can perform tasks such as summarising content and running an analysis of a given dataset on a web page.
title: Anthropic Tests Claude Extension for Google Chrome That Can Complete Certain Tasks Within the Browser

description: Two Apple executives are reportedly in disagreement over each other’s strategy on how the company should proceed with artificial intelligence (AI). Apple’s foray into the AI space has been limited and marred by endless delays. While one of the reasons behind the delay is its late entry into the space, another is its reluctance to spend big when it comes to technology.
title: Apple Executives Reportedly Have a Disagreement About AI Acquisition Deals

description: Flipkart’s Month End Mobile Festival is live in India, offering discounts on smartphones from brands like Samsung, Nothing, Vivo, and Motorola. Along with reduced prices, buyers can avail of up to Rs. 2,500 off via select bank cards, as well as exchange offers and no-cost EMI options. Deals include the Samsung Galaxy S24 at Rs. 46,999, down from Rs. 74,999; the Nothing Phone 3a and Motorola Edge 60 Fusion at Rs. 22,999 and Rs. 20,999, respectively; and budget picks like the Vivo T4x 5G at Rs. 13,499.
title: Flipkart Month End Mobile Festival: Top Discounts on Smartphones from Vivo, Samsung, Motorola, Nothing, More

description: iPhone 17 series is expected to be unveiled by the Cupertino company during Apple’s ‘Awe Dropping’ launch event, which is scheduled to take place next month. The lineup is expected to include the standard iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max, and iPhone 17 Air. Ahead of the September launch event, the colour options for Apple’s upcoming range of smartphones have surfaced online.
title: iPhone 17 Series Colours Leaked Ahead of September 9 Launch; Could Come in Green, Pink, Light Blue, and More Colours

description: Bitcoin and Ethereum stabilised on Wednesday, after ETF inflows ended a six-day outflow streak. According to CoinSwitch, BTC funds saw $250 million in inflows, while Mudrex’s Edul Patel noted that ETH withdrawals into cold storage reduced sell pressure. Altcoins, including Solana, XRP, and Dogecoin, also gained. The US Commerce Department further lifted sentiment by announcing that GDP data will soon be published on the blockchain to improve transparency
title: Market Recovers as Bitcoin, Ethereum See ETF Inflows

description: Samsung Galaxy M07 4G might be unveiled as a budget phone in India soon. Before the official confirmation of the purported phone’s launch, its key specifications and expected price range in India have been leaked online. It is said to pack a 5,000mAh battery, coupled with fast charging support. The rumoured Galaxy M series handset is also said to feature a dual-rear camera setup.
title: Samsung Galaxy M07 4G Could Debut With a 5,000mAh Battery, Other Specifications Leaked Online

description: A Reddit user shared AnTuTu benchmarks of the Google Pixel 10 Pro XL powered by the Tensor G5. The phone scored 1,173,221 overall, placing it alongside the Honor 200 Pro and Motorola Edge 60 Pro. Its CPU score of 415,848 matches chips like the Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 and Dimensity 9300+, showing a 15 percent boost over the Pixel 9 Pro XL but still last-gen level. The GPU scored 367,206, about 20 percent lower than the Pixel 9 Pro XL, comparable to the Snapdragon 8 Gen 1.
title: Tensor G5 Benchmarks Reportedly Show Pixel 10 Pro XL with Weak CPU and Poor GPU Performance

description: Vivo Y500 is confirmed to launch early next month in China. The company recently announced the launch date of the smartphone, along with a few specifications. However, ahead of its much-anticipated unveiling, the upcoming handset has been listed on the China Telecom website with the model number V2506A, according to a report. The listing allegedly revealed the key specifications of the Vivo Y500.
title: Vivo Y500 With Dimensity 7300 SoC Listed on China Telecom Website: Report

description: The HP OmniBook 3 has a premium and sleek design language. The laptop features a 15.6-inch Full HD+ IPS display that offers decent colour reproduction. It also features a powerful AMD Ryzen AI 5 340 processor that can handle most of the daily tasks. Check out the review to learn more about the latest Asus laptop.
title: HP OmniBook 3 Review: A Smart Pick for Everyday Use

description: Huawei is gearing up to unveil a second tri-fold handset in its lineup, following the launch of the Huawei Mate XT Ultimate Design in September 2024. The upcoming Huawei Mate XTs Extraordinary Master will be launched in China on September 4. It is rumoured to be powered by a Kirin 9020 SoC and may feature stylus support. The handset is expected to be offered in two colour options.
title: Huawei Mate XTs Extraordinary Master Set to Launch in China on September 4; Specifications Tipped

description: Google introduced a new artificial intelligence (AI) image model on Tuesday, calling it the company’s best image generation and editing model to date. Dubbed Gemini 2.5 Flash Image, the model improves on both the generation speed and element-based editing. Interestingly, the model went viral on the crowdsourced AI model ranking platform LMArena weeks before its official announcement.
title: Google Introduces Gemini Nano Banana, a New AI Image Model With Improved Character Consistency

description: On Tuesday, the parents of Adam Raine, a 16-year-old boy who recently died by suicide, reportedly filed a lawsuit against OpenAI and its CEO, alleging its chatbot ChatGPT played a role in the suicide. As per the report, the lawsuit claims that the teenager confided in the artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot about his plans to commit suicide.
title: OpenAI, CEO Sued for "Wrongful Death" After ChatGPT Allegedly Helped Teenager Commit Suicide: 5 Things to Know

description: Realme held its 828 Fan Festival in China on Wednesday, where two of its latest concept smartphones were showcased. The brand unveiled a concept smartphone equipped with a mammoth 15,000mAh battery. The handset is advertised to provide up to 50 hours of video playback and also allow reverse charging of other devices. Meanwhile, the Chill Fan phone comes with a built-in fan designed to help manage thermals during heavy-load gameplay.
title: Realme 15,000mAh Battery Phone, Chill Fan Phone Concepts Unveiled at 828 Fan Festival

description: The Samsung Galaxy S25 FE has recently surfaced on retail sites, hinting at an imminent launch.  According to a report citing an online retailer, the phone could cost $649.99 (roughly Rs. 57,000) for 128GB and $709.99 (roughly Rs. 62,300) for 256GB. However, the said website currently lists higher prices of $786 (roughly Rs. 68,900) and $858 (roughly Rs. 75,200) for the 128GB and 256GB options, respectively. Readers are advised to take this information with a pinch of salt.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE US Prices Leaked Ahead of Rumoured Launch

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra battery capacity has been reportedly spotted on a certification website, revealing that Samsung might still equip the flagship with the same battery capacity as its predecessor. This comes after a tipster revealed that the phone could be equipped with a 5,500mAh battery. The South Korean tech giant has not upgraded the battery capacity of its Galaxy S Ultra-series phones since the Galaxy S20 Ultra.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra Might Not Pack a Higher-Capacity Battery

description: Samsung is expected to unveil the Project Moohan XR headset at its September 29 Galaxy Unpacked event in South Korea, with a wider rollout starting October 13. Possibly priced between KRW 2.5 million (roughly Rs. 1,57,000) and KRW 4 million (roughly Rs. 2,51,200), it is expected to compete with the Apple Vision Pro but may see limited demand, with sales targets of just 100,000 units. It is reportedly being seen as a "bridgehead" to other smartglasses that Samsung is said to be developing.
title: Samsung's Project Moohan XR Headset Price Range, Launch Date Leaked

description: Xiaomi has confirmed the date on which it will unveil its latest Android 16-based HyperOS 3 user interface. The tech giant has also started enrolling beta testers to identify bugs and provide feedback on its upcoming OS. Along with this, a company executive has also revealed the list of smartphones and tablets that will first receive the HyperOS 3 update.
title: Xiaomi HyperOS 3 Debut Date Announced: Here’s The List of Devices That Will Be Updated First

description: Apple iPhone 17 series could debut during the Cupertino tech giant’s newly announced ‘Awe Dropping’ event. The launch event is set to take place on September 9. An X (formerly Twitter) user has spotted that the logo for Apple’s event is interactive. As a person hovers the cursor over the logo, the pattern of the heat map changes with it.
title: Apple's ‘Awe Dropping’ Launch Event Logo Offer Fun Interactive Easter Eggs: What You Need to Know

description: Apple has announced its "Awe Dropping" launch event for September 9, where the iPhone 17 lineup is expected to debut with base, Pro, Pro Max, and possibly a new "Air" variant replacing the Plus model. While rumours suggest Apple’s slimmest phone yet, the name remains unconfirmed. A leaked accessories list shows entries for an iPhone 17 Air, hinting at the branding. However, since the source lacks a credible leak history, its reliability remains doubtful.
title: iPhone 17 Air or iPhone 17 Slim? Here's What We Know

description: Kingdom is a Telugu Spy thriller movie that stars Vijay Devarakonda in the lead role. The movie revolves around a police constable named Suri, who goes undercover to infiltrate a smuggling cartel on a Sri Lankan Island. He has to find his long-lost brother, who is now a part of this gang. Watch soon.
title: Kingdom is Now Streaming on Netflix: All Details Here

description: Rokid AI Glasses were announced as a Kickstarter project on Wednesday. The AI-powered wearable is expected to arrive as a competitor to the Ray-Ban Meta Glasses in the augmented reality space. It will be equipped with dual-eye displays, enabling users to see navigational directions and translations in real time. The Rokid AI Glasses come with a 12-megapixel camera and a built-in AI assistant. As per the company, it can also be fitted with prescription lenses.
title: Rokid AI Glasses Announced With Dual Eye Displays, Built-in AI Assistant; Project Goes Up on Kickstarter

description: Apple’s annual hardware launch event, dubbed ‘Awe Dropping’, is scheduled for September 9. Among the highlights is expected to be the iPhone 17 series, arriving with a refreshed lineup and a new Air model this year. Apart from this, we also expect to see the Apple Watch Ultra 3, Watch Series 11, and AirPods Pro (3rd Generation). However, the launch event might spell the end for some Apple devices too, with the company phasing them out to make room for its newest launches.
title: From iPhone 15 to Watch Series 10, Apple’s ‘Awe Dropping’ iPhone 17 Series Event Could Mark the End for These Products

description: Apple has finally announced the date of its hardware launch event, following weeks of speculation. The ‘Awe Dropping’ event is all set to take place in the second week of September. From the iPhone 17 series and new TechWoven cases to AirPods Pro (3rd Generation) and Apple Watch Ultra 3, here’s what to expect from Apple’s ‘Awe Dropping’ event.
title: iPhone 17 Launch Date Announced: What to Expect From Apple’s 'Awe Dropping’ Event on September 9

description: Superman, a DC reboot of the superhero, is back in this action-packed entertainer, directed by James Gunn. In this movie, David Corenswet is Superman. The Movie shows Clark Kent, who has deeper trust issues and is a journalist. But he is also doing his bit to save the Earth. On the other hand is Lex Luthor, Superman's enemy. He is a techy and a villain portrayed in a way that is so smart that he has brought Superman to his knees. In this neck-to-neck fight, will Superman be able to save the Earth? To find out, watch it on Prime, which is now available to rent.
title: James Gunn's Superman is Now Streaming on Prime Video: All Details Here

description: Following a packed July with more than 21 smartphone launches in India from top brands like Nothing, OnePlus, and Samsung, August has kept up the same pace. From the Google Pixel 10 series to the Vivo V60, a plethora of launches have taken place. Thus, you are not short of options if you are contemplating a new smartphone purchase. We have compiled a list of the smartphones launched in India in August 2025
title: Smartphones Launched in India (August 2025): Google Pixel 10 Series, Vivo V60, Oppo K13 Turbo Series, and More
